channel.title: REST on Coding N Concepts
channel.description: Recent content in REST on Coding N Concepts

item.title: Spring @Controller and @RestController
item.description: In this quick article, we’ll see @Controller and @RestController annotations and their difference in Spring MVC.

item.title: Configure Feign Client in Spring Boot
item.description: In this article, we’ll learn how to configure a FeignClient in your Spring Boot project to consume RESTFul APIs from other services.

item.title: Build RESTFul API with Spring Boot
item.description: In this article, we’ll learn step by step, how to build RESTFul API with Spring Boot. We’ll also learn the RestController, HTTP response codes and best practices along the way.
